entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21 except minus 16 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21 except minus 16 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
